name: Planet Defender

We plan to use Steam as the first and the only online selling platform. Use the headset to target the enemies and trigger the controllers to shoot.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
